alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Lincoln; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:38PM CDT until July 16 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 238 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cullen to 6 miles north of Eastwood to 7 miles southeast of Bossier City, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Multiple trees and power lines have been downed across East Texas and Caddo Parish from these storms. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Minden, Springhill, Grambling, Homer, Haughton, Greenwood, Arcadia, Blanchard, Haynesville, Benton, Stonewall, Ringgold, Sibley, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley, Gibsland and Sarepta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across East Texas and extreme Northwest Louisiana. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Lincoln; Red River; Webster
